verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>; and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6912>there<s%>, and was buried there.
And there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>: and they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves together against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Would <S%H3863>that<s%> we had <S%H1478>died<s%> when our <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>!
And why have ye <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> into this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that we should <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H1165>there<s%>, we and our beasts?

And wherefore have ye made us to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in unto this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>? it is no <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2233>seed<s%>, or of <S%H8384>figs<s%>, or of <S%H1612>vines<s%>, or of <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>; neither is there any <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon their <S%H6440>faces<s%>: and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> appeared unto <S%H7200>them<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H175>thou<s%>, and Aaron thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> ye unto the <S%H5553>rock<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that it give <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H4325>water<s%>; and thou shalt bring <S%H5414>forth<s%> to them <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>; so thou shalt <S%H8248>give<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their cattle <S%H8248>drink<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as he commanded <S%H6680>him<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> together <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear <S%H4784>now<s%>, ye rebels; shall we <S%H3318>bring<s%> you forth <S%H4325>water<s%> out of this <S%H5553>rock<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%>: and <S%H4325>water<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly<s%>, and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H8354>drank<s%>, and their <S%H1165>cattle<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Because ye <S%H539>believed<s%> not in <S%H6942>me<s%>, to sanctify me in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, therefore ye shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> this <S%H6951>assembly<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have given <S%H5414>them<s%>.

These <S%H1992>are<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>; because the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and he was sanctified in <S%H6942>them<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> all the <S%H8513>travail<s%> that hath befallen <S%H4672>us<s%>:

how our <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and we <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> dealt <S%H7489>ill<s%> with <S%H1>us<s%>, and our fathers:

and when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%>, and brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H6946>and<s%>, behold, we are in Kadesh, a <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> of thy <S%H1366>border<s%>.

Let us <S%H5674>pass<s%>, I pray <S%H776>thee<s%>, through thy land: we will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H7704>field<s%> or through <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, neither will we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells<s%>: we will <S%H3212>go<s%> along the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1870>highway<s%>; we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, until we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> thy <S%H1366>border<s%>.
And <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>him<s%>, Thou shalt not pass through <S%H3318>me<s%>, lest I come out with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> against <S%H7125>thee<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, We will go up by the <S%H4546>highway<s%>; and if we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of thy <S%H4325>water<s%>, I and my <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, then will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the price <S%H1697>thereof<s%>: let me only, without doing anything <S%H5674>else<s%>, pass through on my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt not pass <S%H5674>through<s%>. And <S%H123>Edom<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him with <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Thus <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>passage<s%> through his <S%H1366>border<s%>: wherefore <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned away from <S%H5186>him<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>, by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>; for he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because ye rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> my <S%H6310>word<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and bring them <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>;

and <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> them upon <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H4191>people<s%>, and shall die there.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> them upon <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And when all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H1478>dead<s%>, they <S%H1058>wept<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, even all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
